'''Z''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
=== Position ===
* {{EnvSprite|chunk}} [[Coordinates|Z]], the number indicating the Z-axis position.

=== Controls ===
* The control button ({{key|Z}}) for showing currently active [[effect]]s in {{BE}}.
* The control trigger {{Nsbtn|zl}} for attacking/breaking on Nintendo Switch.
* The control trigger {{Nsbtn|zr}} for using/interacting/placing on Nintendo Switch.
